title: Easy Sweet Potato Casserole Recipe
description: This easy sweet potato casserole is a holiday classic of mashed sweet potatoes flavored with cinnamon and brown sugar, topped with toasted marshmallows.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Side Dish Casseroles Sweet Potato Casserole Recipes Easy Sweet Potato Casserole 4.5 (82) 63 Reviews 23 Photos This easy sweet potato casserole is simple and yummy. My husband begs me for this dish. I got the recipe from his mother. Submitted by SWINDHAM Updated on October 8, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 23 23 23 23 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 50 mins Total Time: 1 hr Servings: 10 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 10 servings 6 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks 1 cup white sugar ½ cup brown sugar 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon or to taste 1 tablespoon butter, softened 1 cup miniature marshmallows, or as needed Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place sweet potatoes in a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes; drain. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease a deep casserole dish. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Mash potatoes with a potato masher in a bowl until no large lumps remain. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir in both sugars, cinnamon, and butter until well combined. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Transfer sweet potato mixture to the prepared casserole dish. Cover with a layer of miniature marshmallows. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until marshmallows are browned, about 30 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 295 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 385 Calories 1g Fat 91g Carbs 4g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 10 Calories 385 % Daily Value * Total Fat 1g 2% Saturated Fat 1g 4% Cholesterol 3mg 1% Sodium 168mg 7% Total Carbohydrate 91g 33% Dietary Fiber 9g 32% Protein 4g 9% Vitamin C 7mg 7% Calcium 105mg 8% Iron 2mg 11% Potassium 939mg 20% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Easy Sweet Potato Casserole 01 of 23 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 23 Photo by  SadBagel1548 11/30/2024 Was very easy to make and the family liked it. The only thing I could do differently is less cinnamon. I should have done it to taste so it's on me. I will definitely do it again in future years. 👍🏻 03 of 23 Photo by  BriefPita3095 11/22/2023 It came out perfectly! 04 of 23 Photo by  Jules 11/16/2022 Such an easy recipe! SOOOO delectable and perfect! 05 of 23 Photo by  Natalie Abraham 06/13/2020 I adjusted the recipe to 3 servings and used 2 yams to make it. I was worried about the color at first from the brown sugar and cinnamon... but, THIS IS THE BEST THING I HAVE EVER TASTED. I don't know if the portion size changed the recipe, but it is delicious. It tastes like a perfectly roasted marshmallow with pumpkin pie. I may have to devour the whole thing! 06 of 23 Photo by  Tonya Spurgeon 03/21/2020 07 of 23 Photo by  Christine Youssef 12/25/2019 This is so yummy 08 of 23 Photo by  angels 12/21/2019 09 of 23 Photo by  Lisa Sanchez 11/28/2019 10 of 23 Photo by  Angie Wenzel 11/27/2019 1 2 3 Next You’ll Also Love Sweet Potato Casserole with Marshmallows 571 Ratings Indiana's Finest Sweet Potato Casserole 19 Ratings Mashed Sweet Potatoes with Marshmallows 57 Ratings Sweet Potato Eggnog Casserole 12 Ratings Easy Sweet Potato Casserole with Marshmallows 1 Rating Candied Sweet Potatoes 912 Ratings Sweet Potato Casserole with White Raisin 2 Ratings Yam and Apple Casserole 80 Ratings Tennessee Whiskey Sweet Potato Casserole 5 Ratings Easy Southern Sweet Potato Casserole 5 Ratings Slow Cooker Sweet Potato Casserole 220 Ratings Easy Sweet Potato Soufflé 227 Ratings Instant Pot Candied Sweet Potatoes 6 Ratings Mom's Candied Yams with Caramel 28 Ratings Sweet Potato Crunch Casserole 34 Ratings Southern Sweet Potato Casserole 1 Rating Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
